cboCostEstimates.description: As reported by the Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources on January 19, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 297, an act to require the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct a study on the establishment of, and the potential land that could be included in, a unit of the National Forest System in the State of Hawaii, and for other purposes

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 8 (Wednesday, January 13, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CASE:
H.R. 297.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H194]

latestAction.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 254.

title: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct a study on the establishment of, and the potential land that could be included in, a unit of the National Forest System in the State of Hawaii, and for other purposes.
